page.title: 04HOBBIES AND LEISURE TIME
page.content: Most people have hobbies which they do in their leisure time. Some people have energetic hobbies, particularly sports like netball, rugby and football. Most children like energetic hobbies. There are many other hobbies which are much quieter,for example, painting, knitting and stamp collecting. There are many more hobbies which can give pleasure to people of all ages. For some hobbies, special clubs have been formed by those interested. We conducted a SURVEY of hobbies. We asked 36 people what their hobbies were. Most of them had more than one hobby. The most popular hobbies were connected with football and horses. Next came stamp collecting and computing, followed by netball, reading, fishing,collecting postcards,bird watching, looking after dogs and finally cooking.
